text: To make an ability check, roll a d100, a roll under the target stat is a success. rolling doubles over the target stat is a critical failure, doubles under the target stat is a critical success. 90-99 is always a failure 0 & 00 on the d100 equals 0. The DM should only call for an ability check when a character tries to accomplish a task that is particularly challenging, or if failure has a consequence.
